author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36265. As there are different flavors (`label`s) of `SiPixelLorentzAngleRcd` (e.g. `"forWidth"` and `"forAlignment"`) a label mechanism needs to be added to account for such cases.
I profit to enhance `SiPixelLorentzAngleReader` to deal with labels and to add a `fillDescription` method.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests, pass.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Add labels to `SiPixelFakeLorentzAngleESSource` and `SiPixelLorentzAngleReader`
